snippet: The shooting occurred at around 11 p.m. outside an apartment building on Seneca Avenue in the Bronx, the police said.
abstract: Bronx shooting hits a 2-month-old boy in the Bronx; bullet grazed the boy's back, but he is expected to survive; it is not clear if the bullet was fired at the child intentionally.
lead_paragraph: The shooting occurred at around 11 p.m. outside an apartment building on Seneca Avenue in the Bronx, the police said.

headline.seo: Boy, 2 Months, Is Grazed by a Bullet
headline.main: Boy, 2 Months, Is Grazed by a Bullet
headline.print_headline: Boy, 2 Months, Is Grazed by a Bullet
